config.SERVICE_NAME:
Select 'contents_text' as contents_type,
'DUNA.SAAS' as msgType,
'' as ChannelId,
'' as chat_Id,
concat(A.ChatBotName,'-TargetBot') as targetBotName,
concat(A.ChatBotName,'-handler') as targetHandlerName,
'DUNA.SAAS' as msgType,
A.ChatBotKey as bot_token,
A.ChatBotKey as token,
'true' as html,
'false' as markdown,
A.Token as clientId,
A.SecretKey as secretKey,
'' as `time`,
'day' as period,
'의 진척률을 업데이트 해주세요' as quest,
'socialproject.duna' as `trigger-name`,
concat('http://www.socialproject.net/Anaconda.json?CMD=CMD_SEQ_104488032551626220343298&clientId=',A.Token) as `scheduling-url`
from sp.ChatBot A, sp.ChatBotToken B
Where A.Token = B.Token
And ChatBotChannel = 'telegram'
And A.ChatBotKey is Not Null
And A.ChatBotName is Not Null
And A.ChatBotKey != ''
And A.ChatBotName != ''
